items.name: Deadlock Mod Manager
items.description: The most used Mod Manager for Deadlock, developed by the community using open source code and GameBanana API.

items.name: One Lane Map
items.description: A single-lane map for Deadlock, designed for competitive play. Made by jakciechan you can install it through a custom installer by clicking 'OneLane Map' at the top of your screen.

items.name: Gluten's Youtube
items.description: Catch Glooten's whacky youtube videos here, these include EVI (Eternus VS Initiate) and other fun modded/vanilla content.

items.description: Watch Glooten's live streams here, these include modded and vanilla content, as well as some other fun shenanigans.
